Class Meter

java.lang.Object
com.kf7014.citizenmicroservice.model.Meter
public class Meter extends Object
Represents a utility meter in the Citizen Microservice.

This class models both smart meters and citizen meters, tracking their unique identifier and the last recorded reading.

Since:
2024-11-27
Version:
1.0
Author:
Muhammad Naqvi

  • Constructor Details

    • Meter

      public Meter(String meterId)
      Constructs a new Meter with the specified identifier.

      The initial reading is set to 0.0.

      Parameters:
      meterId - The unique identifier for the meter.

  • Method Details

    • generateReading

      public double generateReading()
      Generates a new reading that is higher than the last reading.

      The reading is increased by a random amount between 0.1 and 5.0 units to simulate real-world usage.

      This method is thread-safe to prevent concurrent modifications.

      Returns:
      The updated lastReading after increment.

    • getMeterId

      public String getMeterId()
      Retrieves the meter's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      The meterId as a String.

    • setMeterId

      public void setMeterId(String meterId)
      Sets the meter's unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      meterId - The meterId to set.

    • getLastReading

      public double getLastReading()
      Retrieves the last recorded reading of the meter.
      Returns:
      The lastReading as a double.

    • setLastReading

      public void setLastReading(double lastReading)
      Sets the last recorded reading of the meter.
      Parameters:
      lastReading - The lastReading to set.
